summary: This is an internal FBI email from the New York office forwarding a Washington Post article about a Jeffrey Epstein lawsuit in the Virgin Islands. It appears to be routine notification between FBI personnel about media coverage.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.role: Subject of news article and lawsuit
persons.context: Mentioned as the subject of a Washington Post article about a Virgin Islands lawsuit.

events.title: Washington Post publishes Epstein Virgin Islands lawsuit story
events.description: The Washington Post publishes an article about a lawsuit involving Jeffrey Epstein in the Virgin Islands.

keyFacts: An internal FBI email from January 16, 2020, forwards a Washington Post article about Jeffrey Epstein.
The article concerns a lawsuit involving Epstein in the Virgin Islands.
The email shows FBI New York office personnel were monitoring media coverage related to Epstein.
